## Problem 1

## Problem 2

Use the Accept-Reject algorithm to generate a $Beta(4,6)$.

## Problem 3

Use the Accept-Reject algorithm to generate a [$Weibull(2,3)$](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weibull_distribution).

## Problem 3

Use the Accept-Reject algorithm to generate a [$Pareto(1,4)$](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pareto_distribution). The pdf of the pareto distribution can be obtained from the [EnvStats Package](https://alexkowa.github.io/EnvStats/reference/Pareto.html)
